thread.title: Data Analyst with a Financial Background at Robert Half Technology (Washington, DC)
thread.title_full: Data Analyst with a Financial Background at Robert Half Technology (Washington, DC)

title: Data Analyst with a Financial Background at Robert Half Technology (Washington, DC)
text: Classification: Database Analyst Compensation: DOE Data Analyst - SQL - Financial Background - Database Analyst I am seeking a Data Analyst who will be part of the Financial division. As the Data Analyst you will be responsible for pulling data from data systems, creating filters, creating queries in SQL, and pulling data for analytics and research. As you are a part of the financial division scenarios such as analyzing consumer payments and trends will be part of your everyday duties. Please submit your profile to paela.pani@rht.com if you are interested in this position.
